scripts.build: npm run cleanDist && echo 'Building css' && sass src/assets/styles/base.sass:dist/assets/styles.css && echo 'Building server scripts' && tsc -p tsconfig.server.json && echo 'Building client scripts' && tsc -p tsconfig.scripts.json
scripts.build:watch: npm run cleanDist && concurrently -k "sass --watch src/assets/styles/base.sass:dist/assets/styles.css" "tsc --watch -p tsconfig.server.json" "tsc --watch -p tsconfig.scripts.json"
